p: It is a difficult task how to maximize the protection for health of medical staff, and the safety of wards and hospitals. In our study, none of staff was infected during the clinical practice. Preserving a highly skilled health care workforce is a top priority for any community and health care system. To avoid the aggravation of COVID-19 or collapse of the health system, emergency department was emphasized in our hospital and several recommendations were issued to help support health care workers against the pandemic.
